biotools.summary:
A tool for enhanced annotation of genomic structural variants.

nanotatoR: next generation structural variant annotation and classification.

Whole genome sequencing (WGS) has successfully been used to identify single-nucleotide variants (SNV), small insertions and deletions and, more recently, small copy number variants.

nanotatoR: structural variant annotation and classification author: "Surajit Bhattacharya,Hayk Barsheghyan, Emmanuele C Delot and Eric Vilain.

Short-read sequencing (SRS) is the predominant technique of DNA sequencing used for clinical diagnosis.
